content.question: Shown above are three long, straight current-carrying wires. What are the magnitude and direction of the magnetic field at point <math alttext="P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>P</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> from these three currents?

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
